name: Paloma
description: This is Mexico’s most refreshing highball. Try to find Squirt or Jarritos grapefruit soda if you can.
recipeIngredient: Grapefruit soda (like Squirt or Jarritos), to top

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a highball glass with ice (dip the rim in salt first, if you like). Add tequila and lime juice, then top with grapefruit soda.  Stir ingredients together gently. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

video.name: Paloma
video.description: How to make a paloma, Mexico’s most refreshing highball.
